pages.text: All creatures within the area of the ritual are provided with significant protection, enough to prevent injury and perhaps even enough to prevent death.$(br2)$(warning) This does include hostile creatures who may enter the ritual area, in addition to any passive creatures.$(br2)$(warning) This applies only to entities, not to blocks or buildings.

$(standing_stones) As a $(l:rituals/tiers)$(bold)tier IV$() ritual, $(l:rituals/ritual_warding_protection#multiblock)four standing stones are required$(). Please see later pages of this entry for heights.
Two $(l:rituals/standing_stones)standing stones$() that are three high, and two standing stones that are four high are required.

pages.title: Ritual Specifics
pages.text: $(bold)Duration:$() The ritual lasts $(ritual:warding_protection/SECONDS/duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Size:$() The ritual will try to transmute blocks within an area of $(ritual:warding_protection/radius_x) and $(ritual:warding_protection/radius_z) blocks horizontally, and $(ritual:warding_protection/radius_y) blocks vertically.$(br2)$(bold)Protection$(): Protection is applied every $(ritual:warding_protection/SECONDS/interval) seconds, with the effect itself lasting $(ritual:warding_protection/SECONDS/invuln_duration) seconds.
